Package edu.wpi.first.wpijavacv

Class Summary
WPIBinaryImage A WPIBinaryImage object is a black and white image.
WPICamera A class used to gather images from the robot's camera.
WPIColor A class of colors used for drawing function
WPIColorImage A color image
WPIContour This is a class that represents contours, it can only be obtained from the findContours() method of WpiBinaryImage
WPIDisposable This class is an abstract class defining disposable elements.
WPIGrayscaleImage A grayscale image
WPIImage This class is the superclass of all images.
WPIJavaCVUtils A class with utility functions.
WPILaptopCamera A class used to gather images from cameras connected to the laptop
WPIPoint A class representing a point
WPIPolygon A class that represents a polygon, can be obtained from approxPolygon() in WpiContour
WPIWindow A class that can be used for displaying images
 

Exception Summary
WPICamera.BadConnectionException An exception that occurs when the camera can not be reached.
WPIDisposable.DisposedException An exception to be thrown if an element has already been disposed and the user attempts to perform an operation on it.
